title: Idle Restaurant Tycoon
description: Idle Restaurant Tycoon is an exciting idle game where you can open and become the owner of your own restaurant! Be an effective manager and turn your establishment into the best restaurant in the city! Develop your restaurant and attract more visitors. Earn money and reinvest it in your establishment by buying new furniture and decorations, hiring new employees, and opening additional sectors and rooms. Unlock new dishes, upgrade your kitchen, and earn even more money! Buy new parking spaces so more customers can park their cars and bring you more money. Open an outdoor terrace to earn more stars for your establishment, or open a family room to attract entire families.
